About.Title: About Subtitle Edit
About.AboutText1:
Subtitle Edit is Free Software under the GNU Public License. You may distribute, modify and use it freely.
C# source code is available on https://github.com/SubtitleEdit/subtitleedit
Visit https://www.nikse.dk for the latest version.
Suggestions are very welcome.
Email: mailto:nikse.dk@gmail.com

AddToOcrReplaceList.Title: Add to OCR replace list
AddToOcrReplaceList.Description: Add pair to OCR replace list (case sensitive)

AddToUserDictionary.Title: Add to user dictionary
AddToUserDictionary.Description: Add word to user dictionary (not case sensitive)

AddWaveform.Title: Generate waveform data
AddWaveform.PleaseWait: This may take a few minutes - please wait
AddWaveform.VlcMediaPlayerNotFound: Subtitle Edit needs VLC media player 1.1.x or newer for extracting audio data.
AddWaveform.GoToVlcMediaPlayerHomePage: Do you want to go to the VLC media player home page?
AddWaveform.NoAudioTracksFoundGenerateEmptyWaveform: No audio tracks found! Generate empty waveform?

AdjustDisplayDuration.Title: Adjust durations
AdjustDisplayDuration.Note: Note: Display time will not overlap start time of next text

AssaAttachments.Title: Advanced Sub Station Alpha attachments
AssaAttachments.ImageResized: Image resized to fit current window

AssaSetPosition.SetPosInfo: Click on video to toggle set/move position
AssaSetPosition.ResolutionMissing: PlayResX/PlayResY are not set - set the resolution now?

AutoBreakUnbreakLines.TitleUnbreak: Remove line breaks from selected lines

BatchConvert.Title: Batch convert
BatchConvert.OverwriteOriginalFiles: Overwrite original files (new extension if format is changed)
BatchConvert.FilterSrtNoUtf8BOM: SubRip (.srt) files without UTF-8 BOM header
BatchConvert.FilterMoreThanTwoLines: More than two lines in one subtitle

BinEdit.CenterSelectedLines: Center selected lines (horizontally, keep vertical position)
BinEdit.TopAlignSelectedLines: Top align selected lines (keep horizontal position)
BinEdit.BottomAlignSelectedLines: Bottom align selected lines (keep horizontal position)

ChangeCasing.Title: Change casing
ChangeCasing.NormalCasing: Normal casing. Sentences begin with uppercase letter.
ChangeCasing.OnlyChangeAllUppercaseLines: Only change all upper case lines.

ChangeFrameRate.Title: Change frame rate
ChangeFrameRate.FrameRateNotChanged: Frame rate is the same - nothing to convert

ChangeSpeedInPercent.Title: Adjust speed in percent
ChangeSpeedInPercent.Info: Change speed of subtitle in percent

CheckForUpdates.Title: Check for updates
CheckForUpdates.CheckingForUpdatesNoneAvailable: You're using the latest version of Subtitle Edit :)

CompareSubtitles.Title: Compare subtitles
CompareSubtitles.XNumberOfDifferenceAndPercentChanged: Number of differences: {0} ({1:0.##}% of words changed)
CompareSubtitles.XNumberOfDifferenceAndPercentLettersChan: Number of differences: {0} ({1:0.##}% of letters changed)
CompareSubtitles.OnlyLookForDifferencesInText: Only look for differences in text
CompareSubtitles.CannotCompareWithImageBasedSubtitles: Cannot compare with image based subtitles

DCinemaProperties.Title: D-Cinema properties (interop)
DCinemaProperties.ZPositionHelp: Positive numbers moves text away, negative numbers moves text closer, if z-position is zero then it's 2D

DurationsBridgeGaps.Title: Bridge small gaps between subtitles
DurationsBridgeGaps.ProlongEndTime: Previous text takes all gap time

DvdSubRip.Title: Rip subtitles from IFO/VOBs (DVD)
DvdSubRip.WrongIfoType: IFO type is '{0}' and not 'DVDVIDEO-VTS'.{1}Try another file than {2}

EbuSaveOptions.Title: EBU save options
EbuSaveOptions.TeletextCharsShouldBe38: 'Max# of chars per row' for teletext should be 38!
EbuSaveOptions.NewLineRows: Number of rows added by a new line
EbuSaveOptions.UseBoxForOneNewLine: Check 'Use box around text' for only one new-line

ExportCustomText.Title: Export custom text format
ExportCustomText.SubtitleExportedInCustomFormatToX: Subtitle exported in custom format to: {0}

ExportFcpXmlAdvanced.Title: Export Final Cut Pro XML advanced

ExportPngXml.Title: Export BDN XML/PNG
ExportPngXml.SaveFabImageScriptAs: Choose FAB image script file name
ExportPngXml.SaveDvdStudioProStlAs: Choose DVD Studio Pro STL file name
ExportPngXml.SaveDigitalCinemaInteropAs: Choose Digital Cinema Interop file name
ExportPngXml.SaveDigitalCinemaSmpte2014: Choose Digital Cinema SMPTE 2014 file name
ExportPngXml.SaveFcpAs: Choose Final Cut Pro xml file name
ExportPngXml.FcpUseFullPathUrl: Use full image path url in FCP xml

ExportText.Title: Export text
ExportText.AddNewLineAfterLineNumber: Add new line after line number
ExportText.AddNewLineAfterTimeCode: Add new line after time code

ExtractDateTimeInfo.Title: Generate time as text
ExtractDateTimeInfo.OpenVideoFile: Choose video file to extract date/time info from

FixCommonErrors.Title: Fix common errors
FixCommonErrors.Step1: Step 1/2 - Choose which errors to fix
FixCommonErrors.RemoveLineBreaks: Remove line breaks in short texts with only one sentence
FixCommonErrors.RemoveLineBreaksAll: Remove line breaks in short texts (all except dialogs)
FixCommonErrors.FixUppercaseIInsideLowercaseWords: Fix uppercase 'i' inside lowercase words (OCR error)
FixCommonErrors.FixDoubleApostrophes: Fix double apostrophe characters ('') to a single quote (")
FixCommonErrors.AddPeriods: Add period after lines where next line start with uppercase letter
FixCommonErrors.StartWithUppercaseLetterAfterParagraph: Start with uppercase letter after paragraph
FixCommonErrors.StartWithUppercaseLetterAfterPeriodInsid: Start with uppercase letter after period inside paragraph
FixCommonErrors.StartWithUppercaseLetterAfterColon: Start with uppercase letter after colon/semicolon
FixCommonErrors.FixCommonOcrErrors: Fix common OCR errors (using OCR replace list)
FixCommonErrors.CommonOcrErrorsFixed: Common OCR errors fixed (OcrReplaceList file used): {0}
FixCommonErrors.RemoveDialogFirstInNonDialogs: Remove start dash in first line for non dialogs
FixCommonErrors.FixTurkishAnsi: Fix Turkish ANSI (Icelandic) letters to Unicode
FixCommonErrors.FixSpanishInvertedQuestionAndExclamation: Fix Spanish inverted question and exclamation marks
FixCommonErrors.RemoveHyphensSingleLine: Remove dialog dashes in single lines
FixCommonErrors.FixHyphensInDialogs: Fix dash in dialogs via style: {0}
FixCommonErrors.Fix3PlusLine: Fix subtitle with more than two lines
FixCommonErrors.Fix3PlusLines: Fix subtitles with more than two lines
FixCommonErrors.NothingFixableBut: Nothing could be fixed automatically. The subtitle contains errors - see log for details
FixCommonErrors.XFixedBut: {0} issue(s) fixed but the subtitle still contain errors - see log for details
FixCommonErrors.XCouldBeFixedBut: {0} issue(s) could be fixed but the subtitle will still contain errors - see log for details
FixCommonErrors.FixFirstLetterToUppercaseAfterParagraph: Fix first letter to uppercase after paragraph
FixCommonErrors.FixInvalidItalicTagsExample: What do I care. -> What do I care.
FixCommonErrors.RemoveUnneededSpacesExample: Hey you , there. -> Hey you, there.
FixCommonErrors.FixUppercaseIInsideLowercaseWordsExample: The earth is fIat. -> The earth is flat.
FixCommonErrors.FixLowercaseIToUppercaseIExample: What do i care. -> What do I care.
FixCommonErrors.StartTimeLaterThanEndTime: Text number {0}: Start time is later than end time: {4}{1} -> {2} {3}
FixCommonErrors.UnableToFixStartTimeLaterThanEndTime: Unable to fix text number {0}: Start time is later than end time: {1}
FixCommonErrors.FixMissingPeriodAtEndOfLine: Add missing period at end of line
FixCommonErrors.FixMusicNotation: Replace music symbols (e.g. âTª) with preferred symbol
FixCommonErrors.FixMusicNotationExample: 'âTª sweet dreams are' -> '♫ sweet dreams are'
FixCommonErrors.FixDialogsOneLineExample:
Hi John! - Hi Ida! -> Hi John!
- Hi Ida!
FixCommonErrors.RemoveDialogFirstInNonDialogsExample: - How are you? -> How are you?

GenerateVideoWithBurnedInSubs.Title: Generate video with burned-in subtile
GenerateVideoWithBurnedInSubs.InfoAssaOff: Note: Advanced Substation Alpha styling supported.
GenerateVideoWithBurnedInSubs.InfoAssaOn: Note: Advanced Substation Alpha styling will be used :)

GetDictionaries.Title: Need dictionaries?
GetDictionaries.DescriptionLine1: Subtitle Edit's spell check is based on the NHunspell engine which
GetDictionaries.DescriptionLine2: uses the spell checking dictionaries from LibreOffice.
GetDictionaries.ChooseLanguageAndClickDownload: Choose your language and click download

GetTesseractDictionaries.Title: Need dictionaries?
GetTesseractDictionaries.DescriptionLine1: Get Tesseract OCR dictionaries from the web
GetTesseractDictionaries.ChooseLanguageAndClickDownload: Choose your language and click download

GoogleTranslate.Title: Translate
GoogleTranslate.PleaseWait: Please wait... this may take a while
GoogleTranslate.MsClientSecretNeeded:
Sorry, you need a Cognitive Services 'Translator Text' key from Microsoft to use the latest Microsoft Translator.
Go to "Options -> Settings -> Tools" to enter your key.
GoogleTranslate.GoogleNoApiKeyWarning: Trying to translate without API key... (slow and limited data). To use an API key go to "Options -> Settings -> Tools" to enter your Google translate API key.
GoogleTranslate.TranslateBlockInfo: Go to translator and paste text, copy result back to clipboard and click the button below
GoogleTranslate.TranslateBlockGetFromClipboard: Get translated text from clipboard (Ctrl + V)
GoogleTranslate.TranslateBlockClipboardError2: Go to translator and translate, the copy result to clipboard and click this button again.

ImportSceneChanges.Title: Generate/import scene changes
ImportSceneChanges.SensitivityDescription: Lower value gives more scene changes

ImportText.Title: Import plain text
ImportText.OneSubtitleIsOneFile: Multiple files - one file is one subtitle

JoinSubtitles.Title: Join subtitles
JoinSubtitles.Information: Add subtitles to join (drop also supported)
JoinSubtitles.AlreadyCorrectTimeCodes: Files already have correct time codes
JoinSubtitles.AppendTimeCodes: Add end time of previous file

Edit.Title: Edit
Edit.FixRtlViaUnicodeControlCharacters: Fix RTL via Unicode control characters (for selected lines)
Edit.RemoveUnicodeControlCharacters: Remove Unicode control characters (from selected lines)
Edit.ShowOriginalTextInAudioAndVideoPreview: Show original text in audio/video previews

Tools.Title: Tools
Tools.MergeSameTimeCodes: Merge lines with same time codes...
Tools.MakeNewEmptyTranslationFromCurrentSubtit: Make new empty translation from current subtitle

ContextMenu.ColumnDeleteTextAndShiftCellsUp: Delete text and shift cells up
ContextMenu.ColumnInsertEmptyTextAndShiftCellsDown: Insert empty text and shift cells down
ContextMenu.ColumnImportTextAndShiftCellsDown: Import text and shift cells down
ContextMenu.ColumnCopyOriginalTextToCurrent: Copy text from original to current
ContextMenu.ApplyDurationLimitsForSelectedLines: Apply duration limits for selected lines...
ContextMenu.FixCommonErrorsInSelectedLines: Fix common errors in selected lines...

VideoControls.InsertNewSubtitleAtVideoPositionNoTextBo: Insert new subtitle at video pos (no text box focus)
VideoControls.GoToSubtitlePositionAndPause: Go to sub position and pause
VideoControls.SetStartTimeAndOffsetTheRest: Set sta&rt and offset the rest
VideoControls.TranslateTip: Tip: Use <alt+arrow up/down> to go to previous/next subtitle

Main.VisualSyncPerformedOnSelectedLines: Visual sync performed on selected lines
Main.LoadedEmptyOrShort: Loaded empty or very short subtitle {0}
Main.FileIsEmptyOrShort: File is empty or very short!
Main.OverwriteModifiedFile: Overwrite the file {0} modified at {1} {2}{3} with current file loaded from disk at {4} {5}?
Main.UnableToSaveSubtitleX: Unable to save subtitle file {0} Subtitle seems to be empty - try to re-save if you're working on a valid subtitle!
Main.FormatXShouldUseUft8: UTF-8 encoding should be used when saving {0} files!
Main.NewFrameRateUsedToCalculateTimeCodes: New frame rate ({0}) was used for calculating start/end time codes
Main.NewFrameRateUsedToCalculateFrameNumbers: New frame rate ({0}) was used for calculating start/end frame numbers
Main.FindContinue: The search item was not found. Would you like to start from the top of the document and search one more time?
Main.ReplaceContinueNotFound: The search item was not found. Would you like to start from the top of the document and continue search and replace?
Main.ReplaceXContinue: The search item was replaced {0} time(s). Would you like to start from the top of the document and continue search and replace?
Main.BeforeChangesMadeInSourceView: Before changes made in source view
Main.UnableToParseSourceView: Unable to parse source view text!
Main.CommonErrorsFixedInSelectedLines: Common errors fixed in selected lines
Main.BeforeRemovalOfTextingForHearingImpaired: Before removal of texting for hearing impaired
Main.TextingForHearingImpairedRemovedOneLine: Texting for hearing impaired removed: One line
Main.TextingForHearingImpairedRemovedXLines: Texting for hearing impaired removed: {0} lines
Main.SubtitleAppendPrompt:
This will append an existing subtitle to the currently loaded subtitle which should already be in sync with video file.
Continue?
Main.AppendViaVisualSyncTitle: Visual sync - append second part of subtitle
Main.TranslateSwedishToDanish: Translate currently loaded Swedish subtitle to Danish
Main.TranslateSwedishToDanishWarning: Translate currently loaded SWEDISH (are you sure it's Swedish?) subtitle to Danish?
Main.TranslationFromSwedishToDanishComplete: Translation from Swedish to Danish complete
Main.TranslationFromSwedishToDanishFailed: Translation from Swedish to Danish failed
Main.NumberOfWordsAddedToDictionary: Number of words added to dictionary: {0}
Main.NotAValidMatroskaFileX: This is not a valid Matroska file: {0}
Main.BlurayNotSubtitlesFound: Blu-ray sup file does not contain any subtitles or contains errors - try demuxing again.
Main.ParsingTransportStreamFile: Parsing Transport Stream file. Please wait...
Main.BeforeImportFromMatroskaFile: Before import subtitle from Matroska file
Main.DropFileXNotAccepted: Drop file '{0}' not accepted - file is too large
Main.DropSubtitleFileXNotAccepted: Drop file '{0}' not accepted - file is too large for a subtitle
Main.DropOnlyOneFile: You can only drop one file
Main.CasingCompleteMessageNoNames: Number of lines with casing changed: {0}/{1}
Main.CasingCompleteMessageOnlyNames: Number of lines with names casing changed: {0}/{1}
Main.CasingCompleteMessage: Number of lines with casing changed: {0}/{1}, changed casing for names: {2}
Main.IdxFileNotFoundWarning: {0} not found! Import VobSub file anyway?
Main.ShowSelectionAndForwardXSecondsLinesEarl: Show selection and forward {0:0.0##} seconds earlier
Main.ShowSelectionAndForwardXSecondsLinesLate: Show selection and forward {0:0.0##} seconds later
Main.BeforeRemoveLineBreaksInSelectedLines: Before remove line-breaks from selected lines
Main.NumberOfWithRemovedLineBreakX: Number of lines with removed line-break: {0}
Main.NumberOfLinesReplacedX: Number of lines with text replaced: {0}
Main.NameXAddedToNameList: The name '{0}' was added to name list
Main.NameXNotAddedToNameList: The name '{0}' was NOT added to name list
Main.WordXAddedToUserDic: The word '{0}' was added to the user dictionary
Main.WordXNotAddedToUserDic: The word '{0}' was NOT added to the user dictionary
Main.OcrReplacePairXAdded: The OCR replace list pair '{0} -> {1}' was added to the OCR replace list
Main.OcrReplacePairXNotAdded: The OCR replace list pair '{0} -> {1}' was NOT added to the OCR replace list
Main.UnicodeMusicSymbolsAnsiWarning: Subtitle contains unicode characters. Saving using ANSI file encoding will lose these. Continue with saving?
Main.NegativeTimeWarning: Subtitle contains negative time codes. Continue with saving?
Main.BeforeSetMinimumDisplayTimeBetweenParagr: Before set minimum display time between subtitles
Main.XMinimumDisplayTimeBetweenParagraphsChan: Number of lines with minimum display time between subtitles changed: {0}
Main.BeforeInsertSubtitleAtVideoPosition: Before insert subtitle at video position
Main.BeforeSetStartTimeAndOffsetTheRest: Before set start time and offset the rest
Main.BeforeSetEndTimeAndOffsetTheRest: Before set end time and offset the rest
Main.BeforeSetEndAndVideoPosition: Before set end time at video position and auto calculate start
Main.GetFrameRateFromVideoFile: Get frame rate from video file
Main.LineNumberXExpectedEmptyLine: Line {0} - expected empty line but found number + time code (number skipped): {1}
Main.UnableToReadPluginResult: Unable to read subtitle result from plugin!
Main.BeforeMergeLinesWithSameText: Before merging lines with same text
Main.ImportTimeCodesDifferentNumberOfLinesWar: Subtitle with time codes has a different number of lines ({0}) than current subtitle ({1}) - continue anyway?
Main.PromptInsertSubtitleOverlap:
Insert subtitle at waveform position will cause overlap!
Continue anyway?
Main.SubtitleContainsNegativeDurationsX: Subtitle contains negative duration in line(s): {0}
Main.ErrorLoadIdx: Cannot read/edit .idx files. Idx files are a part of an idx/sub file pair (also called VobSub), and Subtitle Edit can open the .sub file.
Main.ErrorLoadRar: This file seems to be a compressed .rar file. Subtitle Edit cannot open compressed files.
Main.ErrorLoadZip: This file seems to be a compressed .zip file. Subtitle Edit cannot open compressed files.
Main.ErrorLoad7Zip: This file seems to be a compressed 7-Zip file. Subtitle Edit cannot open compressed files.
Main.ErrorLoadPng: This file seems to be a PNG image file. Subtitle Edit cannot open PNG files.
Main.ErrorLoadJpg: This file seems to be a JPG image file. Subtitle Edit cannot open JPG files.
Main.ErrorLoadSrr: This file seems to be a ReScene .srr file - not a subtitle file.
Main.ErrorLoadTorrent: This file seems to be a BitTorrent file - not a subtitle file.
Main.ErrorLoadBinaryZeroes:
Sorry, this file contains only binary zeroes!
If you have edited this file with Subtitle Edit you might be able to find a backup via the menu item File -> Restore auto-backup...
Main.ErrorDirectoryDropNotAllowed: Folder drop is not supported here.
Main.NoSupportEncryptedVobSub: Encrypted VobSub content is not supported.
Main.NoSupportHereBluRaySup: Blu-ray sup files are not supported here.
Main.NoSupportHereDvdSup: DVD sup files are not supported here.
Main.NoSupportHereVobSub: VobSub files are not supported here.
Main.NoSupportHereDivx: DivX files are not supported here.
Main.NoChapters: No chapters found in the video.
Main.DarkThemeRestart: Restart Subtitle Edit for dark theme changes to take effect.

MatroskaSubtitleChooser.Title: Choose subtitle from Matroska file
MatroskaSubtitleChooser.PleaseChoose: More than one subtitle found - please choose

MergeTextWithSameTimeCodes.Title: Merge lines with same time codes

NetworkJoin.Title: Join network session
NetworkJoin.Information: Join existing session where multiple persons can edit in same subtitle file (collaboration)

NetworkStart.Title: Start network session
NetworkStart.Information: Start new session where multiple persons can edit in same subtitle file (collaboration)

PluginsGet.Title: Plugins
PluginsGet.GetPluginsInfo1: Subtitle Edit plugins must be downloaded to the 'Plugins' folder
PluginsGet.NewVersionOfSubtitleEditRequired: Newer version of Subtitle Edit required!

SeekSilence.Title: Seek silence
SeekSilence.LengthInSeconds: Silence must be at at least (seconds)

Settings.Title: Settings
Settings.OpenDataFolder: Open the Subtitle Edit data folder
Settings.MinimumGapMilliseconds: Min. gap between subtitles in ms
Settings.VideoAutoOpen: Auto-open video file when opening subtitle
Settings.RememberPositionAndSize: Remember main window position and size
Settings.RemoveBlankLinesWhenOpening: Remove blank lines when opening a subtitle
Settings.ApplyAssaOverrideTags: Apply ASSA override tags to selection
Settings.ShowLineBreaksAs: Show line breaks in list view as
Settings.MainListViewDoubleClickAction: Double-clicking line in main window list view will
Settings.MainListViewVideoGoToPositionAndPause: Go to video position and pause
Settings.MainListViewVideoGoToPositionAndPlay: Go to video position and play
Settings.MainListViewVideoGoToPositionMinus1SecAn: Go to video position - 1 s and pause
Settings.MainListViewVideoGoToPositionMinusHalfSe: Go to video position - 0.5 s and pause
Settings.MainListViewVideoGoToPositionMinus1SecAn: Go to video position - 1 s and play
Settings.MainListViewEditTextAndPause: Go to edit text box, and pause at video position
Settings.SplitBehaviorPrevious: Add gap to the left of split point (focus right)
Settings.SplitBehaviorHalf: Add gap in the center of split point (focus left)
Settings.SplitBehaviorNext: Add gap to the right of split point (focus left)
Settings.MpvPlayerDescription: https://mpv.io/ - free, open source, and cross-platform media player
Settings.VlcMediaPlayerDescription: libvlc.dll from VLC media player 1.1.0 or newer
Settings.VlcBrowseToLabel: VLC path (only needed if you're using the portable version of VLC)
Settings.WaveformSetVideoPosMoveStartEnd: Set video position when moving start/end
Settings.WaveformListViewFocusMouseEnter: Also set list view focus on mouse enter in list view
Settings.WaveformSnapToSceneChanges: Snap to scene changes (hold Shift to override)
Settings.WaveformBorderHitMs1: Border marker hit must be within
Settings.NetworkSessionNewSound: Play sound file when new message arrives
Settings.PlayXSecondsAndBack: Play X seconds and back, X is
Settings.MusicSymbolsReplace: Music symbols to replace (separate by comma)
Settings.FixCommonOcrErrorsUseHardcodedRules: Fix common OCR errors - also use hard-coded rules
Settings.FixCommonerrorsFixShortDisplayTimesAllow: Fix short display time - allow move of start time
Settings.FavoriteSubtitleFormatsNote: Note: favorite formats will be shown first when selecting a format, the default format will always be shown first
Settings.CreateSetEndAddNewAndGoToNew: Set end, add new and go to new
Settings.AdjustViaEndAutoStartAndGoToNext: Adjust via end position and go to next
Settings.AdjustSetEndMinusGapAndStartNextHere: Set end minus gap, go to next and start next here
Settings.AdjustSetEndTimeAndGoToNext: Set end and go to next
Settings.AdjustSetStartAutoDurationAndGoToNext: Set start, auto duration and go to next
Settings.AdjustSetEndNextStartAndGoToNext: Set end, next start and go to next
Settings.AdjustStartDownEndUpAndGoToNext: Key down=set start, Key up=set end and go to next
Settings.AdjustSetStartAndEndOfPrevious: Set start and set end of previous (minus min gap)
Settings.AdjustSetStartAndEndOfPreviousAndGoToNex: Set start and set end of previous and go to next (minus min gap)
Settings.AdjustStartOneFrameBackKeepGapPrev: Move start 1 frame back (keep gap to previous if close)
Settings.AdjustStartOneFrameForwardKeepGapPrev: Move start 1 frame forward (keep gap to previous if close)
Settings.AdjustEndOneFrameBackKeepGapNext: Move end 1 frame back (keep gap to next if close)
Settings.AdjustEndOneFrameForwardKeepGapNext: Move end 1 frame forward (keep gap to next if close)
Settings.AdjustSetStartAndOffsetTheWholeSubtitle: Set start time, offset the whole subtitle
Settings.AdjustSetEndAndOffsetTheRestAndGoToNext: Set end, offset the rest and go to next
Settings.AdjustSnapStartToNextSceneChange: Snap selected lines start to next scene change
Settings.AdjustSnapStartToNextSceneChangeWithGap: Snap selected lines start to next scene change with min. gap
Settings.AdjustSnapEndToPreviousSceneChange: Snap selected lines end to previous scene change
Settings.AdjustSnapEndToPreviousSceneChangeWithGa: Snap selected lines end to previous scene change with min. gap
Settings.AdjustExtendToNextSceneChange: Extend selected lines to next scene change (or next subtitle)
Settings.AdjustExtendToNextSceneChangeWithGap: Extend selected lines to next scene change with min. gap (or next subtitle)
Settings.AdjustExtendToPreviousSceneChange: Extend selected lines to previous scene change (or previous subtitle)
Settings.AdjustExtendToPreviousSceneChangeWithGap: Extend selected lines to previous scene change with min. gap (or previous subtitle)
Settings.AdjustExtendToNextSubtitle: Extend selected lines to next subtitle
Settings.AdjustExtendToPreviousSubtitle: Extend selected lines to previous subtitle
Settings.AdjustExtendCurrentSubtitle: Extend current line to next subtitle or max duration
Settings.AdjustExtendPreviousLineEndToCurrentStar: Extend previous line's end to current's start
Settings.AdjustExtendNextLineStartToCurrentEnd: Extend next line's start to current's end
Settings.MainCreateStartDownEndUp: Insert new subtitle at key-down, set end time at key-up
Settings.GoToNextPlayTranslate: Go to next line (and play in 'Translate mode')
Settings.GoToNextCursorAtEnd: Go to next line and set cursor at end
Settings.GoToPreviousPlayTranslate: Go to previous line (and play in 'Translate mode')
Settings.GoToPreviousSubtitleAndFocusVideo: Go to previous line and set video position
Settings.GoToNextSubtitleAndFocusVideo: Go to next line and set video position
Settings.GoToPrevSubtitleAndPlay: Go to previous line and play
Settings.GoToNextSubtitleAndPlay: Go to next line and play
Settings.ToggleFocus: Toggle focus between list view and subtitle text box
Settings.ToggleFocusWaveform: Toggle focus between list view and waveform/spectrogram
Settings.CopyTextOnly: Copy text only to clipboard (selected lines)
Settings.CopyTextOnlyFromOriginalToCurrent: Copy text from original to current
Settings.FixRTLViaUnicodeChars: Fix RTL via Unicode control characters
Settings.WaveformAddTextHereFromClipboard: Add text here (for new selection from clipboard)
Settings.WaveformGuessStart: Auto adjust start via volume/scene change
Settings.GoToStartCurrent: Set video pos to start of current subtitle
Settings.ToggleStartEndCurrent: Toggle video pos between start/end of current subtitle
Settings.WaveformGoToPrevSubtitle: Go to previous subtitle (from video position)
Settings.WaveformGoToNextSubtitle: Go to next subtitle (from video position)
Settings.WaveformSelectNextSubtitle: Select next subtitle (from video position, keep video pos)
Settings.SyntaxColorTextMoreThanMaxLines: Color text if more than {0} lines
Settings.MergeSelectedLinesAndUnbreakCjk: Merge selected lines and unbreak without space (CJK)
Settings.MergeSelectedLinesOnlyFirstText: Merge selected lines, keep only first non-empty text
Settings.ToggleTranslationAndOriginalInPreviews: Toggle translation and original in video/audio preview
Settings.ListViewColumnDeleteAndShiftUp: Column, delete text and shift up
Settings.MainTextBoxMoveLastWordDown: Move last word to next subtitle
Settings.MainTextBoxMoveFirstWordFromNextUp: Fetch first word from next subtitle
Settings.MainTextBoxMoveFirstWordUpCurrent: Move first word from next line up (current subtitle)
Settings.MainTextBoxMoveFromCursorToNext: Move text after cursor position to next subtitle and go to next
Settings.MainTextBoxMoveLastWordDownCurrent: Move last word from first line down (current subtitle)
Settings.MainTextBoxAutoBreakFromPos: Break at first space from cursor position
Settings.MainTextBoxAutoBreakFromPosAndGoToNext: Break at first space from cursor position and go to next
Settings.BreakEarlyForLineEnding: Break early for end of sentence (.!?)
Settings.FontNote: Note: These font settings are for the Subtitle Edit UI only. Setting a font for a subtitle is normally done in the video player, but can also be done when using a subtitle format with built-in font information like "Advanced Sub Station Alpha" or via export to image based formats.
Settings.RestoreDefaultSettingsMsg:
All settings will be restored to default values
Continue?
Settings.EditFixContinuationStyleSettings: Edit settings for fixing continuation style...
Settings.UncheckInsertsAllCaps: Detect and uncheck single titles in all-caps (for example: NO ENTRY)
Settings.UncheckInsertsItalic: Detect and uncheck italic single titles, or lyrics
Settings.UncheckInsertsLowercase: Detect and uncheck single titles, or lyrics, in lowercase
Settings.XFramesAtYFrameRateGivesZMs: {0} frames at a frame rate of {1} gives {2} milliseconds.
Settings.UseXAsNewGap: Use "{0}" milliseconds as new minimum gap?

SettingsMpv.DownloadMpvOk: The mpv lib was downloaded and is ready for use.

SettingsFfmpeg.XDownloadFailed: Unable to download {0} - please re-try later!
SettingsFfmpeg.XDownloadOk: {0} was downloaded and is ready for use.

SetVideoOffset.Title: Set video offset
SetVideoOffset.Description: Set video offset (subtitles should not follow real video time, but e.g. +10 hours)
SetVideoOffset.KeepTimeCodes: Keep existing time codes (do not add video offset)

SpellCheck.Title: Spell check
SpellCheck.AddToOcrReplaceList: Add pair to OCR replace list
SpellCheck.AutoFixNames: Auto fix names where only casing differs
SpellCheck.AutoFixNamesViaSuggestions: Also fix names via 'spell check suggestions'
SpellCheck.CheckOneLetterWords: Prompt for unknown one letter words
SpellCheck.TreatINQuoteAsING: Treat word ending " in' " as " ing " (English only)
SpellCheck.LiveSpellCheckLanguage: Live spell check - Working with language [{0}]
SpellCheck.NoDictionaryForLiveSpellCheck: Live spell check - You don't have dictionaries for this language [{0}]
SpellCheck.SpacesNotAllowed: Spaces not allowed in single word!

NetflixQualityCheck.WhiteSpaceCheckReport: Invalid white space found at column {0}.
NetflixQualityCheck.MaximumXCharsPerSecond: Maximum {0} characters per second (incl. white spaces)

SplitLongLines.LongestLineIsXAtY: Longest total line length is {0} at line {1}

SplitSubtitle.Description1: Enter length of first part of video or browse
SplitSubtitle.Description2: and get length from video file:
